title: FUTO's latest grantee loosens Google's grip on your phone: introducing Marvin Wißfeld of MicroG
description:
👉 What is FUTO? https://futo.org/what-is-futo/
👉 FUTO grants email: grantapps@futo.org 

Email us about your project. What's the harm? The worst that happens is we ignore, delete, or say no. Over $680,000 in grants have been distributed since I started working here.

👉 MicroG: https://microg.org/
👉 MicroG patron link: https://liberapay.com/microG/
👉 How Google'd android violates your privacy:
🔵 https://digitalcontentnext.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/DCN-Google-Data-Collection-Paper.pdf
🔵 https://www.scss.tcd.ie/Doug.Leith/Android_privacy_report.pdf
👉 Recent news example of how Google can mess with your life: https://www.nytimes.com/2022/08/21/technology/google-surveillance-toddler-photo.html
👉 FUTO youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/FUTOTECH

Filmed & edited by @TheKinoCorner

title: Why you should NEVER feel bad for blocking ads; youtube's system sucks
description:
